Interface InventoryManagement

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdministratorCtrl
public interface InventoryManagement
Interface for managing inventory-related operations for medications. Provides methods to add, remove, update medication stock, and approve replenishment requests.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addNewMedication()
    Adds a new medication to the inventory.
    void
    approveReplenishRequest()
    Approves a replenish request for a medication, typically when stock is low.
    void
    removeMedication()
    Removes a medication from the inventory.
    boolean
    updateMedicineEntity()
    Updates the medication entity records in persistent storage, such as a database or file.
    void
    updateStockLevel()
    Updates the stock level of an existing medication in the inventory.
    void
    updateStockLowLevelAlert()
    Updates the alert level for low stock of a medication.

  • Method Details

    • addNewMedication

      void addNewMedication()
      Adds a new medication to the inventory.

    • removeMedication

      void removeMedication()
      Removes a medication from the inventory.

    • updateStockLevel

      void updateStockLevel()
      Updates the stock level of an existing medication in the inventory.

    • updateStockLowLevelAlert

      void updateStockLowLevelAlert()
      Updates the alert level for low stock of a medication.

    • approveReplenishRequest

      void approveReplenishRequest()
      Approves a replenish request for a medication, typically when stock is low.

    • updateMedicineEntity

      boolean updateMedicineEntity()
      Updates the medication entity records in persistent storage, such as a database or file.
      Returns:
      true if the medication records were successfully updated; false otherwise.
